author: Christine Rendon
title: Justin Bieber tests positive for COVID-19 and postpones Las Vegas concert to the summer - Daily Mail
description: The singer, 27, learned he contracted the virus on Saturday and is feeling OK, a representative for Bieber told TMZ .
content:
Justin Bieber has tested positive for COVID-19.
The 27-year-old learned about the diagnosis on Saturday and is feeling OK, a representative for the Baby singer told TMZ.
